hanzi-su-wiki:
団

Значения

Группа, коллектив, организация

Мнемоника

Сокращение. Рука 寸 в сосуде 囗 для сбивания масла. Ком. В переносном смысле — группа.

Варианты

團, 团
purpleculture_pinyin:
tuán
Japanese variant of 团
Японский вариант группы
rtega_mnemonic:
団団RSsphere, ball, circle, mass, lump, group
  • small 寸 enclosure 囗 (of people 口)
团團
koohiiStory1: When you are admitted into a group like the Yakuza, you´re well and truly done (だん) for. You must stick to the group like glue, and you will be pent-in for life, never being able to leave.
koohiiStory2: A pent-in group will naturally be more cohesive, or "glued together.".
jp_example_words:
団扇(うちわ): fan
劇団(げきだん): troupe, theatrical company
公団(こうだん): public corporation
団結(だんけつ): unity, union, combination
座布団(ざぶとん): cushion (Japanese-- square cushion used when sitting on one´s knees on a tatami-mat floor)
集団(しゅうだん): group, mass
団体(だんたい): party of tourists
団地(だんち): multi-unit apartments
布団(ふとん): futon
jp_readingExamples: 団結 (だんけつ), 団地 (だんち), 集団 (しゅうだん)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Use your mouth to take a measurement of this group. Just stretch your mouth out and around every single person. Get 'em all in there.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: I hope this group is full of people who enjoy being inside someone else's mouth, because they're gonna be pretty mad when you let them out if they aren't.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: This group is so big it takes you till dawn (だん) to get your measurement: they weigh a ton (とん) too!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine letting this group of, now very wet, people out of your mouth one by one. They don't seem to care that they weigh a ton! That's a large measurement, they should be proud.
Kanshudo_mnemonic: a box (囗) an inch (寸) wide wouldn't hold a group

tuán
яп. вм. 团
Radicals: 口, 寸  (mouth, measurement)
Meaning Mnemonic
Use your mouth to take a measurement of this group. Just stretch your mouth out and around every single person. Get 'em all in there.
I hope this group is full of people who enjoy being inside someone else's mouth, because they're gonna be pretty mad when you let them out if they aren't.
Reading Mnemonic
This group is so big it takes you till dawn (だん) to get your measurement: they weigh a ton (とん) too!
Imagine letting this group of, now very wet, people out of your mouth one by one. They don't seem to care that they weigh a ton! That's a large measurement, they should be proud.
